Title: Trainwreck
Overview: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Fuji Television Network, Dentsu, Apatow Productions
Cast: Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson
